abstract: Standard Chartered and Agricultural Bank of China said Thursday that they had signed a memo of understanding to establish a strategic partnership, a month before the Chinese lender’s anticipated initial public offering.
snippet: Standard Chartered and Agricultural Bank of China said Thursday that they had signed a memo of understanding to establish a strategic partnership, a month before the Chinese lender’s anticipated initial public offering.
lead_paragraph: Standard Chartered and Agricultural Bank of China said Thursday that they had signed a memo of understanding to establish a strategic partnership, a month before the Chinese lender’s anticipated initial public offering.

headline.main: Standard Chartered and AgBank to Team Up
